_sText:
Hey, I'm Aviv. This is my first map, **bhop_mons**. The map consists of 3 stages, with increasing difficulty. The difficulty of the map overall is relatively easy. I made the map with scroll in mind, so it should be do-able on scroll. The map contains **bhop**, **surf**, and a little bit of **xc**.

This is my first published map, so I will appreciate any feedback. If you find any problems with the map just let me know and I'll see what I can do.
Thanks.
